title: <input> type=checkbox & type=radio should fire `input` events
body:
Per the HTML5 spec, checking or unchecking a checkbox or radio button is supposed to fire an `input` event prior to the `change` event. Edge is currently not complying with the standard here. See
https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/forms.html#checkbox-state-(type=checkbox):event-input-input
https://html.spec.whatwg.org/multipage/forms.html#radio-button-state-(type=radio):event-input-input
